    {"text":"as long as you preface it with 'no offense'.", "emotion": "sarcastic"},

    {"text":"Oh, great, as long as you said 'no offense'!", "emotion": "mocking"},
    {"text":"Now I feel totally fine about it!", "emotion": "sarcastic"}
]
